ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: This site has saved my butt more than once.... http://everquest.allakhazam.com/ Alla s site has the best info on quests, IMO. Just look for Quests by Zone on
ygData.messageBody:
This site has saved my butt more than once....

http://everquest.allakhazam.com/

Alla's site has the best info on quests, IMO. Just look for "Quests by Zone" on the left side.

 "John D Pennington, III <edward001@...>" <edward001@...> wrote:

Ok. I've been playing Everquest on line for one night and part of a
day now. I fell off of the bridge once. I got killed by a young rock
hopper. I'm having fun but I'm still looking for Registrar Bindarah.
Will somebody please give me more detailed directions that the npcs
in the game are providing? The velvet on my poor feet is wearing
out. ;)

I'm running a female tiger-like Shaman. I've also noticed that some
of the characters seem to be walking through walls. That's
interesting but it's very puzzling. G.

Edward
